index.intro: We 12 members of Unify have a common philosophy and are determined to serve students with heart. We hope that we can hold a variety of activities for the students and to not lose the traditional activities of Kei Long. At the same time, we will do our best to express different aspirations of students. We also hope that we can use our enthusiasm to create an ideal campus life and a sense of belonging among students.

about.aboutContent:
We 12 members of Unify have a common philosophy and are determined to serve students with heart. We hope that we can hold a variety of activities for the students and to not lose the traditional activities of Kei Long. At the same time, we will do our best to express different aspirations of students. We also hope that we can use our enthusiasm to create an ideal campus life and a sense of belonging among students.

The Unify logo is composed of a bright moon under the night sky and stars which signify that we hope to bring guidance and unity for every student of Kei Long to create a ideal and happy campus

U - Unity 團結

N - Nerveless 沉著

I - Iconic 獨特

F - Faithful 可信

Y - Youthful 朝氣蓬勃

United we fly, Unify
讓我們一起團結地飛行, Unify
